entry.title: SCARANATION BEGINNER GUIDE
entry.content:
#KABUKIMONO
#SCARAMOUCHE
#WANDERER


Scaranation:
A group of amazing human beings, including me, who love Scaramouche from 2020 hit game Genshin Impact so much they made a whole nation for him.

MY BABY BEFDAY: 3/1

PREVIEW
https://youtu.be/UDQ7m2L9sK8?si=ZiqbgqRM3hcyO2k0

i love him

i love his smile
i love his laugh
i love his personality
i love his hair
i love his insecurities
i love his accomplishments
i love his failures
i love his beautiful eyes
i love his beauty
i love his handwriting
i love the way he sings
i love him on his happy days
i love him on his sad days
i love him on the days he feels lonely
i love him on the days he feels helpless
i love him on the days he feels like no one cares
i love him on the days he feels forgotten
i love him on the days he feels unmotivated
i love him on the days he feels loved
i love him on the days he feels sick
i love him on the days he feels motivated
i love him on the days he feels depressed
i love him on the days he feels stresses
i love him on the days he feels crazy
i love him on the days he feels hopeful
i love him on the days he feels cuddly
i love him on the days he feels clingy
i love him on the days he feels amazing
i love him on the days he feels beautiful
i love him on the days he feels like a failure
i love him on the days he feels angry
i love him on the days he feels aggressive
i love him on the days he feels horrible
i love him on the days he feels safe
i love him on the days he feels unsafe
i love him on the days he feels vulnerable
i love him on the days he feels weird
i love him on the days he feels good
i love him when he's healthy
i love how he dance
i love his taste in music
i love his taste in movies
i love his taste in tv shows
i love the way he moves
i love the way he acts
i love him when he cries
i love him when hes kind
i love him when he's mean
i love him when he's alone
i love him when he can't feel
i love him when he feels too much
i love him when he can't take life anymore
i love him when he feels like it's too much
i love him when he's asleep
i love him when he has nightmares
i love him when he has dreams
i love how he believes
i love him when he believes in himself
i love him in his brightest moments
i love his heart
i love him in the day
i love him in the night
i love him at midnight
i love him at 3am
i love him at all times
i love him at your best
i love him at your worst
i love the little things he does

i love all of him
i love him when he's himself

i love you, Kabukimono,Scara,Wanderer

Who is this fine shytt?

‚ù§Ô∏èKABUKIMONO-EI's PUPPET

üíúSCARAMOUCHE-THE 6TH of FATUI HARBINGER

üíôWANDERER

Reminder:They re the same person,but trauma give him an identity crisis

#SIMPle History
Scaramouche, also known as Kunikuzushi (Japanese: ÂõΩÂ¥©) and by his codename The Balladeer, was the Sixth of the Eleven Fatui Harbingers.
Scaramouche is a puppet created by Raiden Ei who appears as a minor antagonist throughout the game, becoming a major antagonist in Sumeru as Shouki no Kami. Following his defeat and learning the truth of the Tatarasuna Incident, he erases his existence from the Irminsul and becomes the Wanderer.

Scaramouche first appears as "???"(the hottest emo i ve seen in my entire life) during the Unreconciled Stars Event Quest The Crisis Deepens, where he introduced himself as a "vagrant from Inazuma." While he appeared to be friendly at first, he learns of the Traveler's identity as the Honorary Knight and tries to strike them down, only to be stopped by Mona, who realized his intentions and helped the Traveler escape just in time.
(he can ruin my life and i d say thank you)

It is later revealed that he traveled to Liyue to investigate mysterious meteorites and entered a dream where he realized that the stars and sky are a "lie" and that "The Jester" had intentionally sent him without forewarning what would happen. After leaving a promising threat against the Traveler, he took his leave to confront the senior Harbinger.


He later headed to Inazuma to oversee the creation of Delusions at a secret facility and confronted the Traveler, recognizing them from before. Rather than facing them head on, he incited them into succumbing to the old gods' wrath

(what if i want to embrace you instead? heheheheh)
, but the plan was partially foiled when Yae Miko walked in. She then negotiated for the Traveler's safety by offering Ei's Gnosis, which he accepted and allowed them to leave safely.(`no gnosis no life‚Äô-ahh scaramouche) .

After obtaining the Gnosis and Signora's death, Scaramouche cut off contact with the Fatui, causing them to believe he had gone rogue. Childe went to Inazuma to track him down to no avail.When the Harbingers convened at Signora's funeral, Il Capitano asked Il Dottore about him, in which Dottore anticipated that Scaramouche would make his move soon.

With Dottore's assistance, the sages of Sumeru Akademiya worked to ascend Scaramouche into a new God of Wisdom under the name of "Shouki no Kami, the Prodigal," comparable to Greater Lord Rukkhadevata. He also gained a follower in the form of Haypasia (fuck this bish,im his first follower,not you)
who had managed to see his past during her connection to Irminsul.
Showcasing his new power to the Traveler after learning Dottore was after her, he hurls lightning across Pardis Dhyai, striking Tighnari as collateral damage in the process.(Dont worry,green fox boy was fine,anyway so my man..-) .

The Traveler eventually returned with Nahida, the vessel of Lesser Lord Kusanali, and managed to defeat him after a prolonged fight, during which Nahida removed the Electro Gnosis powering his new form (Shouki no Kami-lovable gundam)

, much to his horror. In his attempt to beg Nahida not to remove it, he accidentally broke out from the tubing connecting him to his mechanical suit, causing him to fall to the ground (the traveler didnt even catch my babyyy aghhh)
and into a coma.

Nahida would put him into her custody afterwards, hiding him in a secret location.(my room)
Scaramouche would soon recover and, knowing that he had no allies to rely on as Dottore had left with the two Gnoses (Dont worry baby,you have meeeee!!!) , makes a deal with Nahida to search Irminsul on her behalf and also help the Traveler despite being on uneasy terms with them.

During the investigation, Nahida left behind the true events of the Tatarasuna incident for him to discover.
Scaramouche was disgusted to learn that his second "betrayal" was masterminded by Dottore and decides to give his friends a second chance by erasing himself from Irminsul as the Kabukimono and his Fatui codename.

This would retroactively cause his former seat to be remembered as being unoccupied for hundreds of years, but otherwise leave unchanged the tragedies that happened, as they still occurred with seemingly different actors and causes, as the altered memories and records convey
(basically he want to erase himself out of existence,but the motherfucking nature said no,making people just forgot him,but his actions that led to tragedy in the past remained the same)

The Traveler would eventually discover Scaramouche's new incarnation as a wanderer,
having somehow made his way to Sumeru in spite of having no recollection of his actual past. The Wanderer agrees to inherit Scaramouche's memories despite the pain and anguish it would bring.

During the process, the Everlasting Lord of Wisdom emerged to attack, but he recovers and defends the Traveler, gaining an Anemo Vision (because he s An emo) in the process. Forsaking his previous identities and the Fatui, he took on a new name (WE RE GIVEN THE HONOR TO NAME HIM BTW aghhhhh!!!) and promises to help the Traveler behind the scenes when needed while desiring revenge against Dottore

##SIMPle guide to find him
For appearances involving The Balladeer as Wanderer, see Wanderer/Lore ¬ß Quests and Events.

ARCHON QUEST

Chapter II
Act III: Omnipresence Over Mortals
Delusion
Chapter III
Act III: Dreams, Emptiness, Deception
The Gaze From a Certain God

Act V: Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises
As by a God's Side
Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies (cutscene)
Interlude Chapter

Act III: Inversion of Genesis
The Night-Bird Falls at the Curtain's Call
The Kabukimono's Finale (flashback)

EVENTS(already passed sadly)
Unreconciled Stars
Act II: The Crisis Deepens (as "???")
Act III: What the Skies Conceal, the Water Reveals
Act IV: Where Ancient Stars Align

Hues of the Violet Garden
True Tales of the Violet Garden
Act IV: The Palace, Dyed in Black
The Palace, Dyed in Black (flashback)

###SIMPle Build guide
(approximately one month and a half up most to collect based on daily domains,bosses and with account to the resins and regeneration of materials)
